mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comments (author_id, attraction_id, created_at, content) VALUES ( (SELECT user_id FROM members WHERE email = #{requestDto.email}), #{attractionId}, NOW(), #{requestDto.content} )
mapper.select: SELECT c.comment_id AS id, m.email AS email, c.created_at AS createdAt, c.content AS content FROM comments c JOIN members m ON c.author_id = m.user_id WHERE c.attraction_id = #{attractionId} ORDER BY c.created_at DESC
